C

Car - Class in model
Represents a car in the game.
Car(String, String, Car.Color, DriverAI, Game) - Constructor for class model.Car
The Car class constructor.
Car.Color - Enum in model
Used to describe the color of the car.
carBlue - Static variable in class util.Resources
The textures of game components.
carColor - Variable in class main.CarPanel
Button used to cycle through available car colors.
carCount - Variable in class main.Menu
The current number of CarPanels.
carGreen - Static variable in class util.Resources
The textures of game components.
carMainPanel - Variable in class main.Menu
Contains instances of CarPanel representing the cars.
CarPanel - Class in main
JPanel extension which contains all settings for a car and GUI to change them.
CarPanel(int, Menu) - Constructor for class main.CarPanel
CarPanel constructor.
carPanels - Variable in class main.Menu
The array containing all CarPanels.
carPassed(int) - Method in class model.Checkpoint
Saves that the given car has passed this checkpoint.
carRed - Static variable in class util.Resources
The textures of game components.
cars - Variable in class main.Game
An array containing all Cars.
carScrollPane - Variable in class main.Menu
Used to be able to scroll in the carMainPanel.
carsFinished - Variable in class main.Game
The number of cars which have finished the race.
carsPassed - Variable in class model.Checkpoint
Each boolean of the array is set to true once the corresponding car has passed the checkpoint.
carSunk - Static variable in class util.Resources
The textures of game components.
carYellow - Static variable in class util.Resources
The textures of game components.
ch - Variable in class main.Game
2D array of CrosshairTiles forming the crosshair used to get input from human players.
changeColor() - Method in class main.CarPanel
Cycles through the color options for the car and sets the appearance of the color button to match the currently selected color.
checkForCheckpoint(int, int) - Method in class main.Game
Checks whether the tile is checkpoint and saves that the car has passed this checkpoint using the Checkpoint.carPassed() if so.
checkForFinish(Car, int, int) - Method in class main.Game
Checks whether the tile is finish and if the car has passed all checkpoints.
checkForSand(Car, int, int) - Method in class main.Game
Checks whether the tile is sand and sets the car velocity vector to (0;0) using the Car.setVelocity(int[] velocity) method if so.
checkForSpecialTiles(Car, int, int) - Method in class main.Game
Calls all methods which check for special tiles.
checkForWater(Car, int, int) - Method in class main.Game
Checks whether the tile is water and sets the car as "sunk" using the Car.sunk() method if so.
Checkpoint - Class in model
Represents a checkpoint in the game.
Checkpoint(int, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Checkpoint
The Checkpoint class constructor.
CHECKPOINT - model.Tile
 
checkpoints - Variable in class main.Game
An array containing all Checkpoints.
checkTile(Car, int, int) - Method in class main.Game
Checks whether the tile is rideable using the Map.isTileRideable() method and moves the car there or calls the onCarCrash() method accordingly.
color - Variable in class model.Car
The color of the car.
Color() - Constructor for enum model.Car.Color
 
compile(CarPanel) - Method in class util.AICompiler
Compiles the AI of the given CarPanel if it has not been compiled yet and returns an instance of it.
controls - Variable in class main.Game
Displays instructions on how to control the game.
coordinates - Variable in class model.Car
The coordinates at which is the car currently located.
coordinates - Variable in class model.Checkpoint
Stores coordinates of each tile of the checkpoint.
countdown() - Method in class model.Car
Decreases crashCountdown by one and sets the car to "not crashed" if the countdown is finished.
crashCountdown - Variable in class model.Car
Stores the value of how many turn has the car to wait before continuing the race because it has crashed.
crashed - Variable in class model.Car
Is true if the car has crashed and has to skip turns as punishment.
crashed() - Method in class model.Car
Sets the car to "crashed" and start the crash-countdown.
createDocFromFile(String) - Method in class util.DataReader
Creates Document from the given file from the /maps directory.
crosshair - Static variable in class util.Resources
The textures of game components.
crosshairRed - Static variable in class util.Resources
The textures of game components.
CrosshairTile - Class in model
Represents one tile of the crosshair used by human players to control their cars.
CrosshairTile(int[], Game) - Constructor for class model.CrosshairTile
The CrosshairTile class constructor.
